title: New: Lia Lia – OLYMP
body:
This debut track from **Lia Lia** is irresistibly cool, even if the slightly garish video relies more heavily on cliches than your average Chainsmokers song.

Almost feeling like a 90’s trance inspired Lorde, _OLYMP_ is silky smooth and undeniably addictive. Check it out below.
